attributes.action: Provide a response to the overwhelming evidence provided by the recent Channel 4 documentary "The Great Global Warming Swindle"
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Channel 4 recently aired a documentary providing compelling evidence that the media and political movements to reduce CO2 emissions are in fact based on bad science. Why have we been led to believe that current environmental changes are out of the norm?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
